NAS.OL.summary: Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA, together with its subsidiaries, provides scheduled and charter airline services in Norway and internationally. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated a total of 156 aircraft, whereas 65 owned and 101 leased aircrafts in approximately 500 routes to 150 destinations across Europe into North Africa, the Middle East, North America, South America, and South-East Asia. It is also involved in aircraft financing, leasing, and ownership activities; and commercial cargo activities, as well as handles crew services, airline operative support, administrative, ground handling services, and holiday packages through web portal. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Fornebu, Norway.
